description: Last Friday, we released Holly Heart vs Rilynn Rae. We all know the outcome now but what we don't know is how it happened. Today we get a rare glimpse of what happens during interviews, between rounds, all while they don't know the camera is rolling. Get to know Holly Heart and Rilynn Rae on a very very personal Level. This is the REAL show!
title: Behind the Scenes of Holly Heart vs. Rilynn Rae
